catalytic_tests.reaction: Reductive amination of aldehydes with DMF
catalytic_tests.recyclability: At least five times without significant loss in catalytic activity
catalytic_tests.selectivity: High selectivity for aldehydes with different sizes

mechanism_studies.water_role: Auxiliary agent to promote the decomposition of DMF into formic acid
mechanism_studies.proposed_mechanism: Activation of substrates by [Th6] nodes, decomposition of DMF into dimethylamine and formic acid, formation of quaternary ammonium cation intermediate, and reduction to tertiary amine products
